There are many resources for self-guided study. 

## Stuff

### Northwestern access required

Check these out while you still have Northwestern student privileges! 

  * [Tableau License](https://www.tableau.com/academic/students): FREE for students!
  * [DataCamp](http://www.it.northwestern.edu/research/campus-events/data-camp.html): Online courses for R, Python, and SQL
  * [Northwestern R User Group](https://northwestern-r-users.github.io): Lots of good resources for R here! Monthly classroom sessions on rotating topics.
  * [Northwestern IT Training & Events](http://www.it.northwestern.edu/research/campus-events/index.html): Check back here for live workshops on Python & R

Northwestern also provides free Lynda access! 

  *
